ilog.opl

Class IloOplDataSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ilog.opl.IloOplDataHandler
      • ilog.opl.IloOplDataSerializer

  • public class IloOplDataSerializer
extends IloOplDataHandler
    Service class to serialize OPL data objects. Use this class to print OPL data objects.
    See Also:
